nbt.description: The NBT to merge to the item's NBT.
nbt.markdownDescription: The NBT to merge to the item's NBT.

type.description:
## Merge NBT

---


[Item Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_action_types/merge_nbt)

Merges the specified NBT to the item's NBT.

Type ID: `origins:merge_nbt`

---

### Examples

```json
"item_action": {
    "type": "origins:merge_nbt",
    "nbt": "{custom_stuff: 1b}"
}
```

This example will merge the `{custom_stuff: 1b}` NBT to the item's NBT.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Merge NBT (Item Action Type) date: 2022-07-03

Merge NBT

Item Action Type

Merges the specified NBT to the item's NBT.

Type ID: origins:merge_nbt

Fields

Field Type Default Description
nbt NBT The NBT to merge to the item's NBT.

Examples

"item_action": {
    "type": "origins:merge_nbt",
    "nbt": "{custom_stuff: 1b}"
}

This example will merge the {custom_stuff: 1b} NBT to the item's NBT.
